statements: SELECT * FROM crime_data WHERE crime_id = 1;
SELECT crime_type, crime_location FROM crime_data WHERE crime_id = 2;
SELECT crime_location, crime_type FROM crime_data WHERE crime_id > 3;
SELECT * FROM crime_data WHERE crime_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT crime_id, crime_date FROM crime_data WHERE crime_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM crime_data WHERE crime_type = 'Theft' ORDER BY crime_date DESC;
SELECT crime_location, COUNT(*) AS total_crimes FROM crime_data GROUP BY crime_location HAVING total_crimes > 5;
SELECT crime_id, crime_date, crime_type FROM crime_data WHERE crime_location LIKE '%City' ORDER BY crime_id ASC;
SELECT crime_type, COUNT(*) AS total_crimes FROM crime_data GROUP BY crime_type ORDER BY total_crimes DESC;
SELECT crime_id, crime_type, crime_location, crime_date FROM crime_data WHERE crime_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM crimes;
SELECT crime_id, crime_type FROM crimes WHERE crime_location = 'City Center';
SELECT * FROM crimes WHERE crime_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY crime_date DESC;
SELECT crime_type, COUNT(crime_id) AS num_crimes FROM crimes GROUP BY crime_type;
SELECT c.crime_id, c.crime_type, cr.report_date, cr.report_description FROM crimes c JOIN crime_reports cr ON c.crime_id = cr.crime_id;
SELECT * FROM crimes WHERE crime_type = 'Theft' ORDER BY crime_date DESC;
SELECT crime_location, COUNT(*) AS total_crimes FROM crimes GROUP BY crime_location HAVING total_crimes > 1;
SELECT crime_type, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM crimes JOIN crime_reports ON crimes.crime_id = crime_reports.crime_id GROUP BY crime_type;
SELECT c.*, cr.report_description FROM crimes c JOIN crime_reports cr ON c.crime_id = cr.crime_id WHERE c.crime_location LIKE '%Street%' AND cr.report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT crime_id, crime_type, crime_date FROM crimes WHERE crime_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY crime_type ASC, crime_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM crimes;
SELECT crime_id, crime_type, location FROM crimes WHERE date = '2022-01-10';
SELECT name, age, gender FROM suspects WHERE crime_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM crime_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT crime_id, analysis_result FROM crime_analysis WHERE analysis_result LIKE '%suspect%';
SELECT * FROM crimes;
SELECT crime_type, location FROM crimes WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, age, gender FROM suspects WHERE crime_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM crime_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT crime_type, location, crime_description FROM crimes JOIN suspects ON crimes.crime_id = suspects.crime_id WHERE suspects.age > 18;
SELECT * FROM crime_data;
SELECT crime_type, location_id FROM crime_data WHERE crime_id = 1;
SELECT reporter_name, report_date FROM crime_reports WHERE report_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT crime_type, location_name, city, state FROM crime_data JOIN crime_location ON crime_data.location_id = crime_location.location_id;
SELECT crime_id, count(report_id) AS total_reports FROM crime_statistics GROUP BY crime_id;
SELECT crime_type, crime_date FROM crime_data WHERE location_id = 101 ORDER BY crime_date DESC;
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM crime_location WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT crime_type, city, state FROM crime_data JOIN crime_location ON crime_data.location_id = crime_location.location_id;
SELECT crime_id, report_id, crime_rating FROM crime_statistics WHERE crime_rating > 5 ORDER BY crime_rating DESC, crime_id ASC;
SELECT report_id, reporter_name FROM crime_reports WHERE report_date >= '2021-01-01' AND report_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM crimes;
SELECT crime_type, crime_date, crime_location FROM crimes WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery';
SELECT suspect_name, suspect_gender, suspect_dob FROM suspects ORDER BY suspect_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01' AND incident_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT officer_name, officer_rank, officer_department FROM law_enforcement WHERE officer_rank IN ('Sergeant', 'Detective');
SELECT * FROM crimes WHERE crime_type = 'Theft' ORDER BY crime_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_description FROM incidents INNER JOIN suspects ON incidents.suspect_id = suspects.suspect_id WHERE suspect_name LIKE '%Johnson%' AND incident_date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT crimes.crime_type, law_enforcement.officer_name FROM crimes LEFT JOIN incidents ON crimes.crime_id = incidents.crime_id LEFT JOIN law_enforcement ON incidents.incident_id = law_enforcement.officer_id WHERE law_enforcement.officer_rank = 'Detective';
SELECT suspect_name, suspect_gender FROM suspects WHERE suspect_dob BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31' ORDER BY suspect_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reports, report_status FROM crime_reports GROUP BY report_status HAVING total_reports > 5 ORDER BY total_reports DESC;
